topic.title: Current Conferences
topic.section: In current conferences management, the Conference Manager's tasks are around a particular scheduled conference organizing process - setting up submission process and types, and review policies and guidelines, etc.; in addition, making conference timeline and tracks, conference program, conference organizing team, specifying time and location for presentations and events, providing accommodation information; furthermore, offering registration types and policies, and payment methods for potential registrants; import and/or export data, and conference statistics and reports can be made for viewing.
